titleStmt.title: Two common places taken out of Andreas Hyperius, a learned diuine, whereof, in the one, he sheweth the force that the sonne, moone and starres haue ouer men, &c. In the other, whether the deuils haue bene the shewers of magicall artes, &c. Translated into English by R.V.
titleStmt.author: Hyperius, Andreas, 1511-1564.
Vaux, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
